channel.description: Recent content in JavaScript on Youzarsifya7

item.title: Abraj Platinum: Fiber Optic Solutions Website
item.description: Developed a sleek and modern corporate website for a fiber optics and network solutions provider, designed to highlight their technical expertise and elevate their digital presence.

item.title: Royal Platinum: Financial Services UI/UX Website
item.description: A sleek and modern UI/UX Website for a financial services company, built with React.js and Tailwind CSS to translate a Figma design into a pixel-perfect, responsive website.

item.title: OllieBites: A Fast Food Chain Website Prototype
item.description: A fully responsive prototype for a fast-food brand, designed and developed from scratch. Features interactive maps with Leaflet.js and a complete custom UI/UX design.

item.title: Brushstrokes: Skin-Care Products Store Prototype
item.description: A responsive e-commerce prototype for a skin-care brand, built with React.js. Features product listings and detail pages populated from a JSON data source.
